thread.section_title: Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel in Paris
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel in Paris - Review of Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Haylsdd
title: Lovely hotel in Paris
text: We stayed at the Hotel Bradford Elysees last weekend and were so impressed! It's a beautiful hotel and the staff are so welcoming and helpful. Our bedroom was airy, spacious and beautifully designed and breakfast was delicious. The attention to detail and little touches (Honesty Bar, free soft-drinks in the mini-bar) made us feel very welcome and we would have no hesitation in recommending it or staying here again. Thank you!
